Product.ProductDescription: Monitor 27P2Q se ponaša z 68,6 cm (27") velikim zaslonom, ki ga odlikuje IPS tehnologija za širok vidni kot in visoka ločljivost Full HD (1920 × 1080). Opremljen je z ergonomičnim stojalom, ki omogoča odlično prilagodljivost za udobno delo, vhodi HDMI, DisplayPort, VGA in DVI pa zagotavljajo široko povezljivost. Vgrajena sta zvočnika zmogljivost 2× 2 W.

MarketingInfo.element:
Monitor odlikuje zaslon s tehnologijo IPS, ki v kombinaciji z visoko ločljivostjo Full HD zagotavlja izjemno jasen prikaz slike, hkrati pa omogoča široke vidne kote 178° za brezhibno pisarniško delo.

 
Ergonomsko stojalo omogoča številne možnosti nastavitve zaslona vašim potrebam za udobno uporabo, ob strani pa je vgrajeno tudi USB vozlišče za dodatne možnosti povezljivosti.

Product.ProductDescription: 59,9 cm (23,6") ukrivljen gaming monitor AOC C24G2AE (C24G2AE/BK) . VA plošča, ločljivost 1920 × 1080, svetlost 250 cd/m2, statični kontrast 3.000: 1, odzivnost 1 ms , hitrost osveževanja 165 Hz. Vmesnik: 2× HDMI 1.4, 1× DisplayPort 1.2, 1× D-sub, 2× 3,5 mm avdio priključek. Tehnologije: AMD FreeSync Premium, Low Blue Light, Flicker-Free, Motion Blur Reduction, HDR Mode.

MarketingInfo.element: AOC C24G2AE gaming monitor (C24G2AE/BK) navdušuje s svojo visoko ločljivostjo Full HD (1920 × 1080 px), ki zagotavlja izjemno kakovost slike, ostrino in prikazovanje tudi najmanjših podrobnosti. Klasično razmerje stranic slike 16:9 služi za maksimalen užitek v igranju iger, kot tudi za gledanje priljubljenih filmov. Opremite se z višjo hitrostjo osveževanja v primerjavi z drugimi monitorji in pozabite na sovražnike, ki se bliskovito premikajo po zaslonu, zaradi česar jih je težko doseči. S frekvenco osveževanja do 165 Hz boste na zaslonu videli te kritične manjkajoče slike in tako videli sovražnike, ki se premikajo izjemno gladko brez megljenja in prekinjanja. Zaradi bliskovito hitrega odzivnega časa 1 ms je monitor primeren tudi za igranje akcijskih/dirkalnih iger z visokim tempom.

Product.ProductDescription: AOC monitor LED 27G2SAE/BK, 27'' / 68,60cm

element.Value: Full HD, Bela - LED osvetlitev ozadja, Prikaz brez okvirja, Tehnologija brez utripanja, Medla modra svetloba, AMD FreeSync Premium

MarketingInfo.element:
Full HD gaming monitor s tehnologijo zaslona VA in FreeSync Premium tehnologijo priznanega proizvajalca AOC z izjemno 165 Hz frekvenco osveževanja slike in neverjetnim odzivnim časom le 1 ms. Ponaša se z diagonalo zaslona 68,6 cm (27") in 350 cd/m2 svetilnostjo.

 
Za zvok poskrbita dva vgrajena 2 W zvočnika, po želji pa lahko na integriran 3,5 mm avdio priključek priklopite zunanje zvočnike ali slušalke. Povežete ga lahko na priključke HDMI in DisplayPort.
 
Za znatno zmanjšanje in omejitev utrujenosti oči poskrbita funkciji zmanjševanja modre svetlobe in brez utripanja (Flicker-free).

LED monitor AOC 27B2H/EU

Monitor AOC 27B2H/EU odlikuje izvrstna IPS tehnologija. Ponaša se z diagonalo s premerom 68,6 cm (27"), ločljivostjo Full HD (1920 × 1080), frekvenco osveževanja 75 Hz in izjemno tankimi robovi.
 
Nudi vam izredno izkušnjo globine slike z jasnimi podrobnostmi. Za preprečevanje utrujenosti oči vsebuje tehnologijo zmanjšanja modre svetlobe (Low Blue Light) in tehnologijo zmanjševanja utripanja (Flicker-Free).

Vrhunski 80 cm (31,5") monitor AOC Q32E2N prinaša elegantno zasnovo s QHD (2560 × 1440) zaslonom. Odlikujejo ga ozki robovi in izjemno širok barvni spekter, ki zagotavlja pristne in naravne slike. Z odzivnim časom le 4 ms zagotavlja hitro odzivnost in ostrino.

 
Tehnologija Flicker-Free uporablja novo rešitev za uravnavanje svetlosti, ki omeji migetanje in je zato prijaznejša očem. Za zdravje vaših oči in zmanjšano utrujenost ob dolgotrajni uporabi pa poskrbi tudi tehnologija za zmanjšanje modre svetlobe. Monitor je zato odlična izbira tako za domače kot profesionalne uporabnike, ki iščejo vrhunsko rešitev.

element.Name: Funkcije televizije
element.Value: Teletekst, Timeshift, Miracast, Hotel Mode, HLG (Hybrid Log Gamma), Dolby Vision, HDMI - ARC (Audio Return Channel), HDR10

MarketingInfo.element:
Loewe bild i
Fascinatingly multifunctional.
The new Loewe bild i
 
 
Loewe bild i

The new product line bild i scores with first-class 4K OLED panels of the latest generation in 65, 55 and 48 inch sizes.

In combination with the new Loewe SL7 chassis, the  powerful NT7 processor and the new Loewe os7 software, a perfect viewing experience is guaranteed for a wide variety of content. Whether it's films, series, sporting events or video games. You can enjoy the  state-of-the-art standards for picture and sound quality such as Dolby Vision™and Dolby Atmos™.

The completely newly developed and exclusive SL7 chassis offers the highest performance as well as numerous connections, e.g. four HDMI 2.1* inputs with advanced functions such as eARC, HFR, ALLM and four USB connections. The new Loewe os7 software enables outstandingly fast access to all current and natively integrated streaming services such as Netflix, YouTube or Amazon Prime.  

* Features e.g.: enhanced ARC, ALLM, VRR 48-60Hz,
4K@60Hz, 18 Gb/s
 
 

OLED Technology.

The OLED technology stands for bright and natural colours, for perfect contrast - from deepest black to pure white - and for detailed sharpness even in very fast movements. In addition to impressive black and the finest nuances in dark parts of the picture, the OLED technology of the Loewe bild i enables brilliant colour reproduction. This is because against a pitch-black background, colours appear particularly bright and vivid. This makes the screens ideal for HDR films and content with Dolby Vision, which contain more and finer graded colours and a wider range of brightness.
 
 
 

Record your favourite programme.

With the DR+ built-in hard drive, you can record for hours. With a storage capacity of 1TB, your Loewe bild i will be right on schedule. The TV programme can be paused and continued at a later time with a time delay.
 
 
 
Invisible Sound.

The Loewe bild i has a hidden built-in "invisible sound" speaker for invisible sound experience. Moreover, it is compativle with new Loewe klang bar5mr - and in future also directly with new Loewe klang mr system.
 

Enhance your sound experience with the klang bar i

The Loewe bild i is optionally available together with the powerfull Loewe Soundbar klang bar i, which can also be upgraded at any time. The installation below the screen is as simple as can be. The new Loewe klang bar i delights with powerful front-firing stereo sound from eight integrated drivers, generating 80 watts of voluminous total music power. In addition, the soundbar delivers warm low tones and fills the room with rich sound.
 
 
 
New chassis, new possibilities.

Thanks to the new Loewe SL7 chassis, the new Loewe os7 software as well as the new Loewe home screen in combination with the Smart System and the App Store from VIDAA, the Loewe bild c offers a broad range of application possibilities, both at present and in the future.

Whether it's Netflix, Amazon Prime or YouTube - a large number of streaming services are already natively integrated in the Loewe home screen and are accessible at the touch of a button using the dedicated direct buttons on the new Loewe remote control. Quick and direct access to all popular VOD services is guaranteed.

MarketingInfo.element:
• monitor z diagonalo zaslona 60,9 cm (24")
  • VA panel za impresivne barve ne glede na kot gledanja
  • Full HD ločljivost (1920 × 1080)
  • visoka hitrost osveževanja 144 Hz in odzivni čas samo 1 ms
  • igralni način SmartImage in AMD FreeSync
  • Zmanjševanje modre svetlobe in utripanja

VA panel zagotavlja živahne barve in izjemno širok 178° kot gledanja. Idealen je tako za igranje iger kot za pisarniška dela, pa tudi za brskanje po spletu in gledanje filmov. Igralni zaslon omogoča izbor načina prikaza glede na zvrst igre – FPS, dirkaški in RTS. Igralec 1 in Igralec 2 profila omogočata shranjevanje prilagojenih nastavitev. Hitrost osveževanja 144 Hz in odzivni čas samo 1 ms omogočata hipne reakcije. Za gladko premikanje slike brez trganja poskrbi tehnologija AMD FreeSync.

MarketingInfo.element: Monitor AOC C24G2U/BK s FHD ločljivostjo je idealna izbira za igre s hitrim tempom. S svojim čudovitim dizajnom v črno-rdeči barvni kombinaciji in 1500R ukrivljenostjo vas popolnoma potopi v svet iger. VA matrika izniči Ghosting efekt in je še posebej primerna za tekmovalne igre polne akcije. S frekvenco osveževanja 165 Hz in odzivnim časom samo 1 ms vam nobena sličica več ne uide. Preklapljate med različnimi načini igranja za različne tipe iger in še izboljšajte igralno izkušnjo. Za kar najboljše vizualno doživljanje je tu še AMD FreeSync Premium, ki poskrbi za tekoče igranje brez trganja slike.

MarketingInfo.element:
Fast charging & data transfer cable, USB-C to USB-C C-9
 

A cable which you can always insert from the right side! Besides the ease of use, this model provides a high speed of data transfer and charging. The cable is equipped with an E-MARK chip, which enhances the transmission power up to 100 W and provides sufficient bandwidth for fast and complete transmission for video files. Also, the E-MARK chip regulates the power supply, which guarantees that using the cable is safe and efficient. The PD protocol allows you to charge not only smartphones but also laptops, including MacBooks and allows for uninterrupted data transfer even if connected devices change their roles from charging to data transmission and vice versa.

Features:

  • USB-C to USB-C
  • Data Transfer + Charging
  • PD fast charge
  • Power 100 W
  • Max. output voltage 20V / 5A
  • Integrated E-MARK Chip
  • Compatible with MacBook
  • Cable length 1,2 m

Product.ProductDescription: COUGAR Napajalnik 31PL120000P01

MarketingInfo.element:
Za zajezitev globalnega segrevanja napajalnik z večjo učinkovitostjo pomeni dolgo življenjsko dobo in manj izgubljene energije. Serija učinkovitosti COUGAR Polar platinum ščiti Zemljo in naredi najboljše za naslednjo generacijo. COUGAR bo predstavil prvo serijo napajalnikov s platinasto učinkovitostjo, POLAR 1200 in 1050. 100-odstotni japonski kondenzatorji in delovanje v okolju pri 50 °C s strukturo LLC, DC-DC ustvarjajo okolju prijazen napajalnik z visoko učinkovitostjo. Natančno nastavljen HDB ventilator z ničelnim načinom hrupa bo poskrbel tudi za popolno izkušnjo za vse uporabnike v različnih pogojih. Rešite Zemljo z manjšo izgubo energije:- Serija Polar bo zmanjšala izgubo energije pod 7 %. - S certifikatom 80Plus Platinum zagotavlja raven učinkovitosti do 92 % pri 115 Vac. -Manjša izguba učinkovitosti s poenostavljenim valovnim spajkanjem plošča na ploščo. Manjša emisija toplote za enakomerno temperaturo.

- Brezšumni način pri 40 % tihem nalaganju.
- Samodejni termični nadzor za optimalno razmerje med hitrostjo in hrupom. Z uporabo COUGAR-jevega 135 mm tihega ventilatorja HDB in velike luknje za vdihavanje napredni okvir poveča koncentracijo zračnega toka, njegova ukrivljenost ventilatorja pa je bila natančno nastavljena za zmanjšanje vibracij. Celotna kombinacija ventilatorjev vodi do doseganja nizke ravni hrupa ventilatorja A+, ki jo je testiral Cybenetics Lab. Serija POLAR je zasnovana za vrhunske igralce iger in zapletene medijske delavce, ki lahko popolnoma podpirajo GPU serije RTX 30 in zagotavljajo stabilno delovanje.

MarketingInfo.element:
Charge&Data Cable USB Type C

Charge your phone and transmit data between your devices using classic black or white Canyon USB Type C cable. Each one of these basic Type C cables has firm polyvinyl chloride jacket and meets all needed requirements for flawless and stable connection.

Features:
• Flexible 3.5mm wire in firm PVC Jacket
• USB Type C - USB 2.0 compatibility
• 2 meter long
• Capacity: 1A

Product.ProductDescription: CANYON USB-C Kabel C-9 (100W, 1.2M, Bel)

element.Name: Quantity of the packs per pallet (by air)(pcs)
Quantity of the packs per pallet (by sea)(pcs)

MarketingInfo.element:
Fast charging & data transfer cable, USB-C to USB-C C-9
 

A cable which you can always insert from the right side! Besides the ease of use, this model provides a high speed of data transfer and charging. The cable is equipped with an E-MARK chip, which enhances the transmission power up to 100 W and provides sufficient bandwidth for fast and complete transmission for video files. Also, the E-MARK chip regulates the power supply, which guarantees that using the cable is safe and efficient. The PD protocol allows you to charge not only smartphones but also laptops, including MacBooks and allows for uninterrupted data transfer even if connected devices change their roles from charging to data transmission and vice versa.

Features:

  • USB-C to USB-C
  • Data Transfer + Charging
  • PD fast charge
  • Power 100 W
  • Max. output voltage 20V / 5A
  • Integrated E-MARK Chip
  • Compatible with MacBook
  • Cable length 1,2 m

MarketingInfo.element:
Simple Sync&Charge Cable 8-pin Lightning - USB 2.0

Charge your iPhone with this simple and reliable 1-meter long cable. Sync your data by connecting your iPhone to a USB 2.0 port of your Mac or PC. This is a basic and classic product made of high-quality materials, so it will not break during long-time usage. Charge and sync your iPhone reliably!

• 8-pin Lightning - USB 2.0 cable
• 1 meter long
• Made of high-quality wire and plastic
• Compatible with iPhone 5/6/7
